metadata.title: CVE-2012-0220 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the meta plugin(Plugin/meta.pm) in ikiwiki before 3.20120516 allow remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) author or (2) authorurlmeta tags.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0220` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ikiwiki - 3.20120516ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20120516ubuntu1').
